body: Amazing series :) Very lewd and wholesome, the sex scenes are incredibly hot, the male partner is handsome, respectful but still dominant, and the progressive change of the girls feelings about her new body is the mark of the best gender bender doujins. I also really appreciated the threesome with her best friend and her crush, because this lets the possibility of a polycule with all 4 characters, open to imagination :3
Oh it got released, right as I subscribed to the commissioner’s patreon.
If this is chapter 3, where's chapter 2?
